title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 27 October 2016 - XWiki
content:
<lucaa> has quit  
03:24 <jonesmeier> has quit  
03:25 <jonesmeier> has joined #xwiki  
06:42 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:30 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
08:58 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:04 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:18 <mflorea> has quit  
09:40 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:43 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:50 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:51 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:03 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
10:34 <lucaa> has quit  
10:34 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
11:03 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
12:31 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
12:32 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
12:52 <lucaa1> has joined #xwiki  
12:52 <lucaa> has quit  
15:27 <woshilapin> has quit  
15:34 <edvorg> has joined #xwiki  
15:50 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
15:58 <msmeria> has quit  
16:05 <lucaa1> has quit  
16:54 <vmassol> tmortagne: I have a bug when trying to upgrade the RN app on xwiki.org: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/admin/XWiki/XWikiPreferences?editor=globaladmin&section=XWiki.ExtensionUpdater#extension-body-progress--695545785  
16:55 <tmortagne> vmassol: which is ?  
16:56 <vmassol> "Message: Element content can not contain child START\_ELEMENT when using Typed Access methods"  
16:56 <vmassol> seems it's failing to read some xml  
16:56 <vmassol> class org.xwiki.extension.InstallException: Failed to import xar for extension [org.xwiki.contrib.releasenotes:application-releasenotes-ui-1.3]  
16:56 <tmortagne> vmassol: sounds like one of the pages has invalid XML  
16:57 <tmortagne> can I start it to see the error ?  
16:57 <vmassol> sure  
16:58 <vmassol> FTR I tested the changes and they could be installed with a standard import (through our maven package plugin), so I guess one issue is that the EM importer is less lenient than the XAR import feature maybe?  
17:02 <tmortagne> actually it's weird  
17:02 <tmortagne> this error means it tried to read the file as a XML file  
17:02 <tmortagne> not a as XAR  
17:02 <vmassol> weird indeed  
17:06 <tmortagne> ha no  
17:06 <tmortagne> it's when reading an entry from the previous XAR  
17:06 <tmortagne> so it's not when reading the new XAR  
17:07 <vmassol> ok but if I remember correctly the previous XAR was ok. There was a problem for the first or second version of this XAR though  
17:07 <vmassol> like 1.0 or 1.1  
17:07 <vmassol> but 1.2 was ok AFAIR  
17:07 <tmortagne> it's upgrading from 1.1 here  
17:07 <tmortagne> not 1.2  
17:08 <vmassol> ok and this is something you fixed already I think in the code base right?  
17:08 <tmortagne> looks like you did not installed 1.2  
17:08 <vmassol> (I think I remember that you fixed something on this)  
17:08 <vmassol> so I'll import it for now  
17:08 <tmortagne> I don't remember  
17:08 <tmortagne> you sure it was not really something wrong in the XML ?  
17:09 <vmassol> no I mean preventing instaling a new vesion when an old version has a problem  
17:09 <vmassol> I think you fixed that issue  
17:09 <vmassol> right?  
17:09 <tmortagne> the delete maybe  
17:09 <tmortagne> but for an upgrade you have to load the previous  
17:09 <tmortagne> s/delete/uninstall/  
17:10 <vmassol> hmm I'll need to be careful, I need to manually merge stuff :)  
17:11 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/Data/XWiki/8.4RC1/ looks better now  
17:12 <gdelhumeau> great :)  
17:12 <vmassol> I mean: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/Data/XWiki/8.4RC1/#HXWikiSelectWidgetcanbefiltered  
17:12 <gdelhumeau> btw, in the release notes of 8.4, could be reuse the changes from 8.4-rc-1 but with a black list?  
17:13 <gdelhumeau> for example, if we remove from 8.4 something we have done in 8.4rc1  
17:13 <vmassol> no we can't right now  
17:13 <vmassol> there's a jira issue for this already  
17:13 <gdelhumeau> ok so you know it  
17:13 <vmassol> what can be done is remove it from 8.4RC1  
17:13 <vmassol> since it wasn't a good thing  
17:14 <vmassol> it's better to not advertise it anyway even in 8.4RC1 :)  
17:14 <vmassol> (that's what I did for some issue I worked on in 8.3 AFAIR)  
17:14 <gdelhumeau> but sometimes it is just because we have improve it, and it make no sense to display the 2 changes in 8.4  
17:14 <tmortagne> yes it's not like we were removing the jira issue, thoese RN are about main points  
17:14 <vmassol> (I introduced something and remove it because it was a bad idea)  
17:15 <tmortagne> but indeed there is the case where it's a bit difference  
17:15 <tmortagne> like it was partial in RC1  
17:15 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/RN-18  
17:15 <tmortagne> what might be nice is to have ids and if you use the same id in 8.4 it replace the one from 8.4RC1  
17:16 <tmortagne> so that you can simply rewrite it the way you want  
17:16 <gdelhumeau> for example in http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/Data/XWiki/8.3/, we have 2 separated sections for the Not Found Screen  
17:16 <vmassol> yes that could an idea, haven't started thinking about how to implement this issue  
17:16 <vmassol> @gdelhumeau sure but I'm not sure if it's that important  
17:17 <vmassol> even with a blacklist or somrthing, it would still not be working fine  
17:17 <vmassol> well it could, depends  
17:17 <vmassol> for final it would but not for M1, M2, final  
17:18 <vmassol> anyway, it's possible, but I haven't thought about it yet :)  
17:18 <vmassol> also need to think about the changes report  
17:18 <vmassol> (not the RN)  
17:20 <vmassol> hmm found another bug…  
17:21 <gdelhumeau> Enygma`: would you like to check my last commit? https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/45959c669b82321ca97ec338d7965a9c5428c88f  
17:23 <vmassol> @thomas I had installed 1.2 of the RN app actually  
17:23 <vmassol> but since the problem was in v1.1, I also had to import it  
17:23 <vmassol> that's why on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/admin/XWiki/XWikiPreferences?editor=globaladmin&section=XWiki.ExtensionUpdater#extension-body-progress--695545785 it still says 1.1  
17:23 <vmassol> and now it says 1.1 too  
17:24 <vmassol> is that normal BTW? shouldn't the import be considered as an install?  
17:24 <tmortagne> when nothing is there  
17:24 <vmassol> ah hmmm  
17:25 <tmortagne> but registereing the id of the imported XAR all the time was creating too many issue with people importing just one page from some standard page for any reason  
17:25 <vmassol> something we could improve in the future no?  
17:25 <tmortagne> no  
17:25 <tmortagne> it's on pupose  
17:25 <tmortagne> purpose  
17:25 <vmassol> hmmm  
17:26 <vmassol> is there something (jira?) I can read about this to understad the problem?  
17:26 <evalica> has quit  
17:26 <vmassol> (not urgent though)  
17:26 <vmassol> (just curious)  
17:27 <vmassol> so for xwiki.org how do we fix it so that next time I can upgrade the extension?  
17:27 <tmortagne> vmassol: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-10618  
17:27 <vmassol> thx  
17:28 <tmortagne> I guess the quickest is to remove it from the extension index on filesystem  
17:28 <vmassol> I guess I could remove the extension from the perm dir and reinstall  
17:28 <vmassol> yes  
17:28 <vmassol> next time we do a restart...  
17:29 <tmortagne> remove it now  
17:29 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
17:29 <tmortagne> (otherwise next time you will forget :))  
17:29 <vmassol> well I need to be prepared to install it  
17:29 <vmassol> ah no  
17:29 <tmortagne> you don't care  
17:29 <vmassol> the pages will still be there  
17:29 <tmortagne> yes  
17:29 <tmortagne> it just won't be marqued as installe  
17:29 <vmassol> I'll just have all pges in conflict I guess  
17:29 <tmortagne> marked  
17:30 <tmortagne> only if there is changes  
17:30 <vmassol> (when I install v1.3)  
18:03 <evalica> has quit  
18:20 <vmassol> has quit  
18:28 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki
